title: Patch 9
content: I to increase behavioural differences between animals and humanoids. Notable humanoid fighters now know when actions won't succeed and when to prioritise easy wins. Made NPCs better at deciding when to Shove characters to their death. Made NPCs more patient and smarter with healing spells, preferring to heal those with lower HP. Adjusted Halsin's HP, removed upcasted spells from his spell list, gave him Call Lightning, and made his spell usage more varied. Improved Astarion's combat strategies.
